data.message: My app it's up to date and I'm still don't get the reaction or emoticons on my galaxy note 5, what should I do?

replies.message: Hey Chika. Have you tried hovering over the Like button on desktop or holding down the Like button on mobile to see Reactions? If you're still having trouble, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1QsHDz1. -Jordan
I have tried everything but nothing works! Uninstalling the app and install it again but nothing.
Hi Chika. We're glad that you're interested in expressing yourself through Reactions. Please hang tight while our team rolls this out to everyone. -Jordan
Thank you.
I've tried everything as well and mine don't work either

Facebook. we have all reported it to the link that you posted and our problem with reactions have been ignored. We just get a automated response. Kinda like what your doing to our issues with our accounts not having option to use reactions. We need to know this issue is being looked at instead of these automated responses we are all getting. Everyone has done as they have been asked and got NO help! I for one can log into another account on any of my devices and be able to use the reactions where as if i'm logged into mine the reactions disappear. Please help
I can't get them.
Yeah my girlfriend has em on her account even though she's a guest user on my iPhone.

You not missing nothing 
Bunch of confusedness

Sounds like it must be the browser your using on your computer/phone 😞 hope you get it soon. It is nice to be able to put a sad face or angry face or heart for love instead of always just thumbs up like
I think many of us want this one added:
Can that be included in reactions?  It really would be used by many.  Thanks!!  Please consider adding it......
Ok thanks it doesn't work for me either

I'm still don't get the reaction or emotions on my IPhone.
What should I do?
Thanks.
I don't get them on my iPhone 5 either
Guess we're not special enough for the rollout
I don't have them either
Chika Rodriguez try turning your device off and back on again. Hope it helps! 😀
Misty Phillips Marcum tried that
I'm not getting them on my iPhone either.
i can't get them either. I have an iPhone 6+
Facebook  i can't get them either. I have an iPhone 6+
I can't get mine either and my app is up to date?
Can't get them either!
